events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The delivery date was supposed to be last week.
The issue was categorized under Delivery Delay based on customer report of late shipment.
The case has been assigned to the delivery support team for further assistance on the shipment delay.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I will be happy to help you track your shipment.
Could you please provide your order number or tracking ID so I can check the status of your delivery?
Sure, my order number is 789456123. I’ve been checking the tracking page but it hasn't updated in days.
Thank you for the details. I contacted the courier and found out there was an unexpected delay. We expect delivery within the next 3 days.
Alright, I’m relieved to hear it should arrive soon. Thanks for checking with the courier for me.
We have confirmed your package was delivered today. Please let us know if you have any issues with your order.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your order and that everything is satisfactory.
Yes, I received the package and everything looks good. Thanks so much for your help!
We are glad to have resolved your delivery issue. Closing this case now, have a great day!
